elements.text: You meet up with your neighbor once a week to have lunch and catch up with each other. This week, due to your symptoms, you cannot remember everything they have said. When you ask the same question again, they feel like you are...

elements.name: Lunch with Neighbor_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
